overview.subtitle: Where limestone karsts meet emerald waters
overview.intro: Quáº£ng Ninh Province is home to the legendary Háº¡ Long Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring thousands of limestone karsts rising majestically from emerald waters. Beyond the famous bay, this coastal province offers pristine beaches, mysterious caves, floating villages, and rich cultural heritage that spans centuries.

best_time.title: Best Time to Visit
best_time.description: The ideal time to visit Quáº£ng Ninh is from October to April when the weather is cool and dry. March to May offers the most pleasant temperatures for exploring caves and cruising the bay.

cultural_significance.title: Cultural Heritage
cultural_significance.description: Quáº£ng Ninh is not just about natural beauty - it's a place where ancient fishing traditions meet modern tourism. The floating villages of Háº¡ Long Bay represent centuries of maritime culture, while the province's coal mining history adds another layer to its cultural tapestry.

attractions.intro: From the world-famous Háº¡ Long Bay to hidden caves and pristine beaches, Quáº£ng Ninh offers experiences that will take your breath away and create memories to last a lifetime.

welcome.title: Welcome to Wonder
welcome.content: Welcome to Quáº£ng Ninh, home to Háº¡ Long Bay - one of the world's most spectacular natural wonders! Prepare to be amazed by towering limestone karsts, mysterious caves, and emerald waters that have captivated travelers for centuries.

attractions.title: Legendary Attractions
attractions.content: From the iconic Háº¡ Long Bay to the magnificent SÆ¡n TrÃ  Cave, Quáº£ng Ninh offers attractions that seem to belong in fairy tales. Each limestone formation tells a story millions of years in the making.

food.title: Ocean's Bounty
food.content: Taste the treasures of the sea with Quáº£ng Ninh's exceptional seafood cuisine. From the famous squid cakes to rare sea worms, every dish is a celebration of the ocean's generosity.

shopping.title: Treasures & Pearls
shopping.content: Discover natural pearls cultivated in the pristine waters of Háº¡ Long Bay, along with unique handicrafts and souvenirs that capture the essence of this magical region.

transport.title: Journey Methods
transport.content: Navigate Quáº£ng Ninh's waters by traditional junk boats, explore caves by kayak, or take scenic cable cars for panoramic views of the limestone wonderland.

conclusion.title: Your Quáº£ng Ninh Adventure Awaits
conclusion.content: You're now ready to embark on one of the most spectacular journeys in Vietnam. Let the ancient limestone karsts and emerald waters of Quáº£ng Ninh create memories that will last a lifetime!
